metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8761 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In OpenStack Swift through 2.10.1, 2.11.0 through 2.13.0, and 2.14.0, the proxy-server logs full tempurl paths, potentially leaking reusable tempurl signatures to anyone with read access to these logs. All Swift deployments using the tempurl middleware are affected.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8761` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-swift - 2.30.0+git2023011011.9c5cbaa5-0ubuntu1
swift - 2.30.0+git2023011011.9c5cbaa5-0ubuntu1
swift-account - 2.30.0+git2023011011.9c5cbaa5-0ubuntu1
swift-container - 2.30.0+git2023011011.9c5cbaa5-0ubuntu1
swift-object - 2.30.0+git2023011011.9c5cbaa5-0ubuntu1
swift-object-expirer - 2.30.0+git2023011011.9c5cbaa5-0ubuntu1
swift-proxy - 2.30.0+git2023011011.9c5cbaa5-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: swift package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.30.0+git2023011011.9c5cbaa5-0ubuntu1').
